message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split, giving me a slight advantage since the money is worth more to me.
I think a 55/45 split is more fair, considering the value of the money is decreasing faster for me.  Let's be reasonable and find a solution we both can agree on.
Let's be fair. I think a 50/50 split is the most reasonable now, considering the value of the money is decreasing faster for both of us. Let's end this game on a good note.
